Assess control effectiveness through transaction testing, process reviews and business unit control self-assessments. Summarize results and quantify existing risk levels. Ensure business partners are aware of their operational risk responsibilities and provide knowledge of policies and procedures. Apply advanced modeling and analytical skills to create meaningful measurement and reporting on key risk exposures. Display an advanced understanding of information technology, data management and statistical analysis to both prevent and measure operational risk.
